name: search-and-save
description: User can perform multiple Google searches - User can perform SEC search - First pages per search will be saved as PDFs

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npx puppeteer browsers install chrome && if [ -d /app/.cache/puppeteer ]; then mkdir -p ./.cache && mv /app/.cache/puppeteer ./.cache; fi

author: Nicholaus Rowe
